Summary: UFO followed by helicopters across the Pennines UK.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing with a friend on the hill which is a part of St Aidens church in Rochdale when we noticed a craft crossing the Pennines from the North and travelled due South, the speed of the craft was tremendous. Its flight path was sporadic as it initially flew North to South and then stopped dead in its tracks, from memory i think it then shot towards a S Westerly direction, stopped and the navigated to the East, stopped one last time and then disapeared towards the N East. A couple of minutes later three or four black helicopters crossed over the Pennines from the original direction of the craft. The craft was black and circular shaped. I was wondering if anybody else remembers this occurence? Please bear in mind that i may be out with the year.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around July 17th 1984
